citation.title: A Lopsided Look at Evolution: An analysis of the fossil record reveals some unexpected patterns in the origin of major evolutionary innovations, patterns that presumably reflect the operation of different mechanisms.

blogs.title: Jerry Coyne's Chapter on the Fossil Record Fails to Show "Why Evolution Is True"
blogs.summary:
In my article yesterday, I began to review Jerry Coyne's book Why Evolution is True (2009). In this second installment, I offer a critical analysis of Chapter 2 of Coyne's book.

Chapter 2: Written in the Rocks

Chapter 2 addresses the fossil evidence for

author.name: Evolution News & Views
author.description: Evolution News and Views (ENV) provides original reporting and analysis about the debate over intelligent design and evolution, including breaking news about scientific research, academic freedom cases, and educational policy issues. ENV also covers how the rest of the newsmedia report on the debate, offering analysis and corrections to major news stories, as well as a behind-the-scenes look at how journalists and news outlets operate when they report on this issue.

facebook.title: A Lopsided Look at Evolution
facebook.summary:
Esteban Serrano:  "but as a scientist, i relish in the beauty. I look at the cosmos and admire it's beauty."

"if you observe the fossil record, and carbon date it. you'll see a slow progression from species to different "kind" of species. "
